body_html: I'm having a similar issue. It seems like there is an integer overflow in maxpooling_op.cc when training on large images. I'm currently mitigating this by reducing the resolution of the input images.
body_text: I'm having a similar issue. It seems like there is an integer overflow in maxpooling_op.cc when training on large images. I'm currently mitigating this by reducing the resolution of the input images.
body: I'm having a similar issue. It seems like there is an integer overflow in `maxpooling_op.cc` when training on large images. I'm currently mitigating this by reducing the resolution of the input images.
